pageContext.claim: “The NFL, I hope the NFL learned from their last little go-round two years ago when they got, when they were losing 25-30% of their fans. I hope they learned.”
pageContext.analysis: It’s not clear what Trump is referring to here. NFL ratings did take a three point dip in 2017, but ratings are not the only indicator of a fan base. Attendance to home games rose that year and has remained fairly steady since 2005.
